doc.after: As part of its mission NIST supplies industry academia government and other users with over 1 300 Standard Reference Materials SRMs These artifacts are certified as having specific characteristics or component content used as calibration standards for measuring equipment and procedures quality control benchmarks for industrial processes and experimental control samples
